Tato hra se rozhodně neopírá o pohodlnost hraní. To může někomu připadat lehce odpudivé, protože někomu se nemusí líbit, že ho hra omezuje například tím, že si nemůže vybrat za jakou třídu chce hrát. Někomu také může vadit, že umírá během pár sekund, protože dostává do gatí od kulometných hnízd nebo sniperů. A nebo to, že si nemůže sprayovat se zbraněma, protože mají obrovský odpor. Dámy a pánové, vítejte v pravé simulaci 2. světové války! Hrůza války na západní frontě byla zde naprosto výborně vystižena. Hra také disponuje několika různými mapami a ani herních módů není málo. A když se do toho zaberete, na všechny omezení zapomenete.
Hra má ale jedno velký mínus. Ne na každých, ale na některých mapách se může stát, že si protivník vybuduje neporazitelnou obranu a vykašle se na útok. V tento moment je vskutku těžké se dostat za nepřátelské linie. (ale není to nemožné) Ovšem na většině mapách si najdete cestičku a dostanete nepřítele na kolena zezadu! Jediné, co bych tomu vytknul je vybavení "průměrného" vojáka. Většina map se poté zasypána granáty a vy se téměř nemůžete pohybovat bez toho, aby vám něco explodovalo pod nohama.

DoD may not have the most advanced graphics by today's standards, but team gameplay is great and the game even runs smooth on older computers. There are still over 300 active servers and bunches of clans out there 6 years after its release (that alone tells you it must be a decent game)  ...and did I mention the fact it costs less than a pint of beer! I've paid over $50 for games not even 1/2 as much fun as this one!

Uh
Not too sure what to write here so heres a recipe for Pancakes instead

Ingredients:
1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
3 tablespoons sugar
1 tablespoon baking powder
1/4 teaspoon salt
1/8 teaspoon freshly ground nutmeg
2 large eggs, at room temperature
1 1/4 cups milk, at room temperature
1/2 teaspoon pure vanilla extract
3 tablespoons unsalted butter, plus more as needed


Now to make it
1. In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, and nutmeg.
2. In another bowl, beat the eggs and then whisk in the milk and vanilla.
3. Melt the butter in a large cast iron skillet or griddle over medium heat.
4. Whisk the butter into the milk mixture. Add the wet ingredients to the flour mixture, and whisk until a thick batter is just formed
5. Keeping the skillet at medium heat, ladle about 1/4 cup of the batter onto the skillet, to make a pancake. Make 1 or 2 more pancakes, taking care to keep them evenly spaced apart. Cook, until bubbles break the surface of the pancakes, and the undersides are golden brown, about 2 minutes. Flip with a spatula and cook about 1 minute more on the second side. Serve immediately or transfer to a platter and cover loosely with foil to keep warm. Repeat with the remaining batter, adding more butter to the skillet as needed.
6. Procedure for adding fruit to pancakes: Once the bubbles break the surface of the pancakes, scatter the surface with sliced or diced fruit, or chocolate chips, nuts, etc. Flip with a spatula and cook for 1 minute more, being careful not to burn toppings

Very good game for a reasonable price. It came up quite cheap during this years Winter Sale, and I thought, go for it.
9/10 Day Of Defeat became a victory after it ended up in my library.

Now, this game is a absolute masta peece, graphics are fine, controls are responsive, has a nice mixture of team based combat and a little bit of rambo. Overall, a great game, but it suffers from what a lot of these olders games (Pre 2010) suffers from. Same with older CODs, Counter strike source, and this game. People have been playing for a REALLY long time. So people have had a REALLY long time to practice. So this game has a VERY steep learning curve. This is a warning to any new players.

Vocês estão vendo que não tenho (no momento) nem perto de 1 hora de jogo. Mas eu já joguei muito Day of Defeat Source quando ele foi lançado, jogava com meus amigos na Lan House e online também, mas brincava muito com eles entre nós mesmos e ainda lembro bem desse jogo.

Day of Defeat é um Counter Strike Source de segunda guerra mundial, creio eu que os fãs de Counter Strike ainda o Source vão gostar, e quem não é fã vai gostar também.

Mapas baseados em lugares onde aconteceu os combates na vida real, mas claro, com o jeito Valve de ser, mapa limitado do mesmo jeito de CS. 

O bom do jogo é que nos servers tem limite de snipers, que são no máximo 2 pra cada time.
A batalha é Estados Unidos vs Alemanha Nazista, não a monstruosa potência a Rússia (União Soviética) e nem a Grã Bretanha, só Estados Unidos e Alemanha mesmo, na minha opinião deveria a Valve ter feito atualizações colocando mais essas duas nações.

O legal do jogo é o cara do Machinegunner, pra poder usar essa arma na ação tem que deitar ou se posicionar em uma mesa, saco de areia, capô de um veículo, enfim, algum obstáculo para ativar o bipé e meter chumbo na galera.

Comprei esse jogo ontem e baixei hoje, no momento, nesse horário da manhã, os server quase que totalmente vazios, há uns 3 servers brasileiros que estavam vazio, um chamado D.T.B Dominated Brasil estava com 2/32 jogando, acho que esse vazio também deve ser por dois motivos; o horário e também véspera de Natal e galera pra praia, acredito que deve ser isso.

O jogo Team Fortress 2 tem grandes servidores brasileiros de muitos anos na ativa e de grande sucesso como ZM Brasil e CZS Brasil. Na minha modéstia opinião, acho que esses dois servers deveriam criar salas no Day of Defeat Source, para fazer com que ele viva, ou pelo menos tentar. DoD Source é um jogo em potencial, poucos mapas comparando com todos os títulos do CS e Team Fortress 2, mas esses dois servidores famosos também criam mapas, deveriam criar mapas de forma mais correta do que aquele jeito animado todo fora da realidade rsrsrs.

Se tiver alguém da ZM e da CZS Brasil lendo minha análise tá aí a opinião, e procurar incentivar a galera de comprar esse jogo que mesmo no preço normal dele está barato R$19,99 comprei ontei na promoção por R$4,99.

Incentivo a vocês a comprarem, quem é membro de outros servidores brasileiros além da ZM e CZS e que tems erver em jogos da Valve e outras emrpesas criem servidor nesse jogo pra da vida a DoD Source, esse jogo precisa reviver e estar no topo junto com CS e Team Fortress 2. E criem mapas bacanas e se possível os mapas baseado em lugares reais da segunda guerra.

Lembro-me de um server na época em que o jogo foi lançado, os caras botara o mapa De_Dust do CS Source no DoD Source, era mó massacre, seria elgal vocês da ZM e CZS e outros fazerem isso, mapas de CS Source no DoD Source, nota mil. Espero que estejam lendo e que, mais breve, façam isso.

O jogo vale a pena comprar, mesmo não tendo tanta gente. Compre também pra pelo menos ver algums erver brasileiro criar suas salas nele. Vamos tentar reviver esse jogo gente, ele não pode "morrer" com o tempo, como disse, por no topo como TF2 e CS, ótimo jogo para se divertir. ^_^

swearing simulator 2016

C'est un bon jeu qu'il ne faut pas aborder comme un fps standard. 

1° Il faut le jouer parce que vous avez envie de jouer dans une atmosphère de guerre mondiale. 
2° Il faut se la jouer un peu plus survie, pupute, campouse et avancer prudemment car tout ou presque vous one shot.
C'est un gameplay plus "lent" que d'ordinaire. C'est sûr que c'est pas du Battlefield ou tu rentre dans le tas avec 5 balles dans le corps full vie...

Parfois un peu chiant, notamment au niveau HUD inégal où l'arme des nazis cache la moitié de l'écran quand on vise, même si sa tir droit sans viser ou encore parce qu'un joueur connait parfaitement une map et les cachettes (quand c'est vous c'est jouissif  ;) ).
Ce n'est pas le meilleur FPS mais il est pas mauvais. Il procure des sensations différentes. Pour l'apprécier il faut vous dire que vous allez mourrir.

C'est un TRES BON JEU si vous avez un gosse et que vous voulez lui faire passer l'envie d'entrer dans l'armée de terre.
Better than CS :D / Jobb, mint a CS :D

Its different from day of defeat but its still good. Once again you have to download bots from the internet but the game looks and plays well enough that i think people will be playing it for a long time

The Main gamemode is like a mix of control point and territorial control from TF2 and to top it all of all of the guns have recoil like in CSGO(however you can run and shoot pretty easily and theres no weapon spread)
Since you die quickly and machinegun nest are hard to take down you be fighting over one point for AlONG time
and theres other times where the enemy team completely blitzkrieg the game and wins in like 1 minute(the 1st scenario is more common)
The two sides each have different weapons it could just be me but all of the german weapons (besides the assault primary) are way better than the allied counter part
Like in TF2, theres no all-round best class each class/gun has their advantages and drawbacks so your team has to be well balanced to win
PROS:
+ well designed but hard to use weapons
+very well lit maps. Theres nothing more annoying than dimmly lit maps
+with a 1,000+ people every second it community isnt dead
+ can run on a microwave but has old graphics
+well designed maps
+custom maps
+ community servers
CONS
-no valve servers
-like with most old games thers alot of veteran players out there that will destoy you
-asymetrical teams
-even though they look good in HL2 the ragdoll physics look goofy here
-not getting a constant steam of updates like the newer valve games
-small servers are really unfair; play on large servers only

verdict: recomended game espicially on sale

Day of Defeat: Source

Realmente este jogo me surpreendeu pelos seguintes aspectos.

- Graficos muito bom (para epoca)
- Mesma engine do CsSource (o nome ja diz)
- Servidores BR (e com admins ativos)
- interdependência entre as classes de personagens
- Diferente de "Counter-Strike", morrer não significa ficar definitivamente de fora do round atual
- Cada mapa possui cinco pontos de captura, sendo que alguns são mais valiosos que outros. 

Você que joga CSGO vai estranhar a EDUCAÇÃO da galera do DoD :) *nao tem aquela criançada chata gritando no casual*

graficamente non meraviglioso ma storicamente molto interessante, giocavo la sua prima versione e l'ho scaricato da poco in questa nuova e per alcuni versi rivista versione. Non apprezzo la grafica rimasta molto indietro rispetto ad altri titoli del genere ma rimane pur sempre un gioco dal fascino senza tempo.

Graphically not wonderful but very interesting historically, I played his first version and I downloaded it recently in this new and in some ways revised version. I do not appreciate the graphics lagged far behind compared to other titles in the genre but it is still a game of timeless charm.

If you are a WW2 fan or you love hardcore shooters, this game is for you. Its a way different approach than say, Counter Strike. (You can't compare them and that's not what i'm going to do)

You have 1 gamemode, it involves around capturing flags. There are two teams, the Americans are Germans. Both teams are treated equally (which is awesome, its not like the americans are the good guys and the nazis stupid germans that scream like a girl) and have six classes each with their own sets of weapons. Each class has a ranged attack, melee and explosives (grenades). Most of the classes get a backup pistol with them.
The classes are: (German equipment first, the American and then what they share)
- Rifleman (Mauser Kar89k, M1 Garand and rifle grenades) Has the ability to use ironsights and focuses on long-range combat.
- Assault (MP40 and M1A1 Thompson, a smoke grenade and a frag grenade) For CQB.
- Support (STG-44/MP-44 and B.A.R, 2 frag grenades) For mid and close range and surpressive fire.
- Sniper (Kar98K Scoped and the M1903 Springfield Scoped). No grenades. For long range and to take out classes like other snipers and machinegunners.
- Machinegunner (MG-42 and Browning M1919A4 (I think)) No grenades. Anti sniper, anti machinegunner and to take out large groups of enemies. Must be deployed using the bipod to shoot accurately. (hipfire not advised lol)
- Rocket (not the rocket itself, the class) Uses a Panzershreck and M1 Bazooka. As a secondary you get the Mauser C96 or M1 Carbine (my fav). Anti Sniper and machinegunner.

The classes all have the same health and speed. You die fast (in 1-3 shots, always 1 shot headshot) and rushing is not advised. The game is extremely faced paced and competitive. You need to work together as a team, use your microphone or voice commands to communicate. The voice commands are awesome and well voiced. 
Besides that you have the option to go prone (using Z as default I think) This greatly reduced recoil and makes you harder to hit. The disadvantage of it is that when to go prone or out of prone you holster your weapon for 1-2 seconds. I've died many times of this. You get used to it after a while, though. Another option is to sprint. There is a stamina bar that lets you sprint for a few seconds. You cannot shoot while sprinting. In the realism modes, when you get shot in your arm, you drop your primary weapon. A pretty neat feature, but annoying at the same time.

The gunplay itself it pretty well done, it has the same feature as Counter Strike when you are standing still, you accuracy with the most guns is near perfect and when you are moving your accuracy decreases. Almost all the guns have massive recoil, and I mean massive, it takes a lot of skill to master.

The base game comes with a lot of maps and many custom maps too which I don't care about. The stock maps are good and have cool shortcuts and offer a lot of replay value.

There is no singleplayer unless you download a bot mod, which I haven't tried. There are plenty of multiplayer servers to choose from.

The servers mostly consist of 32 player slots, which means 16 vs 16 players.

For active servers DON'T use the serverbrowser, its broken, use Gametracker to locate servers instead. The EdgeGamers servers are pretty good, their clan is EgO (I think). These servers have all the realism settings turned off and have a medic mod that lets you call a medic by typing !medic in the chat. I advise binding this to a key. The medic only heals when your health is below 25 HP (that is when the healthbar turns red). Ping isn't a problem really, but above 150 ping the game becomes unplayable (no shit sherlock)
There are a lot of realism servers too, but its your choice on what to play.

Community is awesome and mostly mature players. There are daily around 900-1100 players online across all regions.

The game runs almost on every system, I have no problems with it really, and I have a low end PC.

What I hate about Day of Defeat is the constant explosive spam. Grenades deal massive damage and get spammed mostly in doorways and passages. You have the option to throw the grenades back, but this is hard to do. Best to counter the spam is to flank the enemy.

Do I recommend it? Heck yes!

TL:DR: great game I advise you buy it, its worth the full price or wait for steam sale and buy the Valve multiplayer pack. Same price and comes with CSS. (For Gmod textures lol)

Se amate il periodo della seconda guerra mondiale e cercate un gioco arcade che non costi molto, questo fa per voi. Versione ricreata con il motore source di Valve, Dod in origine era una mod per Half life. Non sarà un gioco competitivo ma è molto divertente e frenetico: Classi con armi non varie (poiche si useranno sempre le stesse) ma bilanciate; mappe non tanto grandi e con vicoli e corridoi dove (purtroppo) a volte ti ritrovi circondato da camper, in compenso è possibile giocare anche su mappe inserite dagli utenti. Insomma alla fine vale provarlo

This is my most favoritest game ever.

Mechanics work okay.
Balance is a bit off with MGs being a near unstoppable force.
Also, while it DOES make sense lorewise to have different weapons for each team, some are really more useful in certain situations than their respective counterparts.
I'm looking at you, Kar98k.

Grenade spam is effective, but at least you can't jump with them. Or, well, you can, ONCE.

Recommended nonetheless, though more neutral than anything.

Day of Defeat: Sourse - один из моих любимых сетевых шутеров, про который, почему то, многие забыли. Разработчик - всеми известная VALVE, которая выпустила эту игру в 2005 г. на движке Sourse. По своей сути DoD - это та же CS, только на тематику Второй Мировой Войны. На выбор нам дается две стороны: вермахт и союзники. Каждая сторона разделена на 6 классов, каждый из которых имеет свою экипировку, достоинства и недостатки. Задачи перед вами будут стоять разные, в зависимости от карты. Это либо типичный захват точек, либо уничтожение/защита объектов. Так чем меня зацепила на столько простая игра? Так простотой и зацепила! Любителям Battlefield 3 и отличного графона тут не место! DoD - это просто хороший тактичный шутер, простой в освоении, а главное - с адекватными игроками! Наиграл я в неё 70 часов и не припомню, чтобы за это время встречал в игре неадекватов и вопящих школьников. А адекватные игроки - это очень важно для любой игры, особенно такой тактичной, как эта.
Прошло столько времени, а я до сих пор захожу вечерками в эту поистине хорошую игру!
Macht viel Spaß wenn, man Russisch und Deutsch kann, so kann man mit sehr vielen Menschen aus verschiedensten Kulturen spielen 9/10
